docs.text: About Me I am a computer engineer/scientist/bioinformatician at UCSD. My research interests are in bioinformatics and more specifically, I focus on computational mass spectrometry. During my graduate studies, I had the honor of being advised by Nuno Bandeira PhD. Currently, I am pursuing my post-doctoral work with Pieter C. Dorrestein PhD in the Skaggs School of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences. Prior to coming to San Diego, I attended the University of Illinois for my undergraduate degree in Computer Engineering. However, it was in Missouri that I spent my most impressionable years. Contact Information University of California San Diego Office: SSPPS 4105 Email: miw023 [at] ucsd [dot] edu

docs.text: In my spare time I attempt to arrange, record, and mix music. Have a listen! Holiday Music Starting from 2011, I produced holiday music for my friends. Auld Lang Syne Recorded 2011 Your browser does not support the audio element. Mistletoe Recorded 2012 Your browser does not support the audio element. Winter Wonderland Recorded 2013 Your browser does not support the audio element. White Christmas Recorded 2014 Your browser does not support the audio element. Since 2015, I have had a fruitful collaboration with Andrew T. Nelson. Listen to our Holiday EPs . Other Music Tonight You Belong to Me feat. Cait Recorded 2017 Go to Sleep feat. Sheryl Recorded 2016 Your browser does not support the audio element. Lullabye feat. Sheryl Recorded 2016 Your browser does not support the audio element. Mary Rock feat. Sheryl Recorded 2016 Your browser does not support the audio element. What Makes You Beautiful Recorded 2016 Domino Recorded 2016 Kiss Recorded 2016 Back Here Recorded 2014 Your browser does not support the audio element. You're Gonna Miss Me feat. Sharon Recorded 2013 Your browser does not support the audio element. Goodnight Sweetheart Recorded 2013 Your browser does not support the audio element. Waffle Song Recorded 2013 Your browser does not support the audio element. Me and Julio Down by the School Yard (Live) feat. Marlena Recorded 2012 Your browser does not support the audio element. Bye Bye Love (Live) feat. Marlena Recorded 2012 Your browser does not support the audio element. Gee Baby (Live) feat. Marlena Recorded 2012 Your browser does not support the audio element. Hero feat. Dave Recorded 2012 Your browser does not support the audio element. Lucky feat. Sheryl Recorded 2010 Your browser does not support the audio element. What I've Been Looking For Recorded 2010 Your browser does not support the audio element. Baobei Recorded 2008 Your browser does not support the audio element. A Cappella During the 2011-2012 school year, I was a member and a director of a co-ed a cappella group ( Acamazing ) which I helped found in 2010. The following are performances during my tenure as director of which several pieces I arranged. Absolutely (Story of a Girl) - Nine Days Breathe - Michelle Branch Mercy - Duffy

docs.text: Other Projects Potato Surfer I created potato surfer in 2014 with a couple of friends. We wanted to recreate the viewing experience of television on the internet with internet content. Users can view channels with none of the modern viewing amenities, such as pause and rewind. We've removed the tyranny of choice with users only able to change channel with everyone sync'd up. Additionally, users can also be channel producers: curating content and scheduling content display with full control of their own channel. At our peak we had thousands of users but have since shut it down. The Great Watermelon Study of 2015 Have you ever wanted to pick the best watermelon while standing at the store but didn't know how to tell? Well, check out the blog at https://watermelon4lyfe.wordpress.com/ .
docs.title: Other

Users can view channels with none of the modern viewing amenities, such as pause and rewind. We've removed the tyranny of choice with users only able to change channel with everyone sync'd up. Additionally, users can also be channel producers: curating content and scheduling content display with full control of their own channel. At our peak we had thousands of users but have since shut it down.
